effects.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.  Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
effects.shortEffect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.  Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.

moveDescription:
The target is razed with a mystical fire of great
intensity. This may also leave the target with a burn.
